Class UserServiceBase<TUser, TRole, TKey>

Namespace
NuvTools.Security.Identity.AspNetCore.Services
Assembly
NuvTools.Security.Identity.AspNetCore.dll

Provides a base service for user management operations, built upon UserManager<TUser>.

public abstract class UserServiceBase<TUser, TRole, TKey> where TUser : UserBase<TKey> where TRole : IdentityRole<TKey> where TKey : IEquatable<TKey>

Type Parameters

TUser

The user entity type.

TRole

The role entity type.

TKey

The type of the user's primary key.

Inheritance
object
UserServiceBase<TUser, TRole, TKey>
Inherited Members
object.GetType()
object.MemberwiseClone()
object.ToString()
object.Equals(object)
object.Equals(object, object)
object.ReferenceEquals(object, object)
object.GetHashCode()

Remarks

This abstract base class consolidates common user-related actions such as creation, updates, password management, email confirmation, and role assignments.
It standardizes the return model using IResult and IResult<T>.

Constructors

Provides a base service for user management operations, built upon UserManager<TUser>.

This abstract base class consolidates common user-related actions such as creation, updates, password management, email confirmation, and role assignments.
